title: Bug 44778TableItem.getImage periodically throws ArrayOutOfBoundsException
description: In the final call to imageList.get (imageIndex), sometimes imageIndex == 1.This causes an ArrayIndexOutOfBounds exception in the call to imageList.get.This is happening because the index of ptr [0] is not in the table. Would it bepossible to put in a check for this? It causes a bunch of other downstream errors.
